dmca.title: [EV1-C1806261E] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION? Marks (Our reference no. 2.27.95)
dmca.body:
t -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, November 14, 2006 7:38 AM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1806261E] =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION=3F?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?_Marks_(Our_reference_no._2.27.95)?= Subject: [EV1-C1806261E] =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION=3F?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?_Marks_(Our_reference_no._2.27.95)?= ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION=3F?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?_Marks_(Our_reference_no._2.27.95)?= Added by system at Monday, Nov 13 2006 10:04 pm X-MailFrom: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Nov 13 22:04:14 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 13 Nov 2006 22:03:10 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 13 Nov 2006 22:03:11 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GjpVu-0007J2-Vb for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 13 Nov 2006 22:03:11 -0600 Received: from [38.100.41.83] (helo=cyveillance.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GjpVq-000FMO-CO for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 13 Nov 2006 22:03:06 -0600 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail3.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 70E50B755B; Mon, 13 Nov 2006 23:01:49 -0500 (EST) Message-ID: <33035346.1011163476980779.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com> Date: Mon, 13 Nov 2006 23:03:00 -0500 (EST) From: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?Unauthorized_Use_of_WESTERN_UNION=3F?= =?ANSI_X3.4-1968?Q?_Marks_(Our_reference_no._2.27.95)?= MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=ANSI_X3.4-1968 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Disposition-Notification-To: IPBrandProtection@westernunion.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Nov 2006 04:03:10.0779 (UTC) FILETIME=[CCA430B0:01C707A1] MIME element (text/html)

WESTERN UNION HOLDINGS, INC.

12500 E. Belford Avenue,

Englewood, CO. 80112 U.S.A


11/13/2006
 
VIA E-MAIL at  abuse@theplanet.com
 
Abuse

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas TX, 75207

Re: Unauthorized Use of the WESTERN UNION® Marks in the Meta Tags on http://3933.znvbju.info/ (Our reference no. 2.27.95)

To Whom It May Concern:


This notification and request concern use of the WESTERN UNION service marks in the Meta Tags on the website at  http://3933.znvbju.info/, for which you are listed as registrant and/or administrative contact.

Western Union Holdings, Inc. ("Western Union") owns all intellectual property rights in the famous WESTERN UNION family of trademarks and service marks (the "WESTERN UNION Marks"), which include the words "WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" standing alone, as well as the WESTERN UNION ?? design and Western Union?s golden yellow and black trade dress. The WESTERN UNION Marks, which have been in use in some instances since 1851, are famous throughout the world in connection with numerous and varied communication and financial services. Worldwide, Western Union owns over 720 registrations for WESTERN UNION Marks and over 150 pending applications for WESTERN UNION Marks. Through Western Union?s long-standing use and promotion of the WESTERN UNION Marks in international commerce, the Marks have acquired great value and goodwill.
 
It has been brought to Western Union?s attention that the WESTERN UNION Marks are being used in the meta tags on the web! site located at  http://3933.znvbju.info/. Western Union is concerned that this unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks will confuse consumers as to whether Western Union somehow is associated with, or approves of,  http://3933.znvbju.info/ and/or the activities conducted through  http://3933.znvbju.info/. Further, Western Union is concerned that such authorized use of its Marks may dilute their distinctiveness and Western Union?s good will.
 
Western Union understands that you may not previously have been aware that such use of the WESTERN UNION Marks is not authorized and that it may violate U.S. and international trademark laws. Accordingly, this letter is formal notification that Western Union cannot permit such unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks and a formal request that such use immediately cease.
 
Please ensure that the WESTERN UNION Marks immediately are removed from the w! ebsite and/or meta tags  at  http://3933.znvbju.info/ ; that any print, electronic, and other forms of promotional materials containing any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar to the WESTERN UNION Marks (including uses in metatags, hidden text, keywords or other "ad triggers," postURL or forwarding commands, hyperlinks, or any other electronic coding) are withdrawn from publication; and that you  refrain from further use of any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar thereto. We stress that the WESTERN UNION Marks include the words "WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" alone, the WESTERN UNION double-bar logo, and the distinctive WESTERN UNION golden yellow and black trade dress ? and any marks or names confusingly similar thereto, including variants, abbreviations, and misspellings of the words "WESTERN UNION."
 
We look forward  to receiving your written response to our notification and request. Please do not hesitate to contact us with you further! questions or concerns.
 
This notification and request do not prejudice Western Union's rights and remedies related to this matter, which hereby are expressly reserved.
 
Sincerely,
Western Union Holdings, Inc.- Intellectual Property Group
12500 Belford Ave. M21A2
Englewood, Colorado 80112
Fax # 720-332-0219
 

This email is sent by the General Counsel's Office of The Western Union Company and may contain information that is privileged and/or confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and delete this e-mail and any attachments. Thank you
